website_summaries.verdict: While it has some nice features, the known disassembly challenges are sometimes a drawback.
pros: Unique design with a 360-degree ventilation, wide opening, mid-level space, mid-range price
Galvanized steel frame keeps it in place in most conditions
cons: Extremely difficult to take down, fold, and put back into its carrying case

customer_reviews.title: Quick pitch. Great for picnic.
customer_reviews.text: This thing pops open in a flash. Folding it up will take a bit of practice until you get the hang of it. It can fit up to two petit adults or kids side by side inside. Back door zips open to provide ample cross ventilation. The pockets for sand weight are a good idea but on a windy day you will need more weight on the insdie to keep it from flying away. There are stakes provided but I’m too lazy to use it. I’d rather leave an ice chest on the inside to weigh it down.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Tomasito

customer_reviews.title: and the worst part was if you don't put it in right ...
customer_reviews.text: Setup is insanely fast... but taking it down and getting it back in the bag is impossible. I can only describe trying to get it back into the bag as trying to heard a group of cats. The directions are vague and unclear about how to get it back into the bag, and the worst part was if you don't put it in right you can permanently damage/deform the wire that keeps the shape. It was great when it was out of the bag, but there needs to be an easier way to get it back into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tate D. Shippen

customer_reviews.title: Nice beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Really like this beach tent Way larger than I expected Super easy to open I like the option to open the entire back “wall” Vented bottom for air flow Was pretty easy to fold back up and I like the carrying bag I got mine from amazon “used” and it came in excellent condition Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: LaraB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pop up tent
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our annual beach trip but haven't gotten there yet so I tried it out inside. It was very easy to use. All you need to do is take it out of it's carrying case which is very convenient and has handles and the tent pops up for use. Literally took 5 seconds. It is a Great size, we were able to fit two adults and a child in it with room to spare. It was quite easy to fold up and put away, just follow the directions provided and it works. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G

customer_reviews.title: easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Canopy sets up very quickly , is spacious enough for wife and I and offers enough shade on backside for my dog to relax in. The 4 sand pockets work well although learned its better to have a scoop with you as 2 front are so close to opening its almost impossible not to get alot of sand inside canopy. The draw strings work well to keep canopy from moving round on windy days. It has taken about 8 use's to master closing first time, although its impossible for one person to close and put in circular holding bag. Have to have two people to close and store back in bag
customer_reviews.author: clifford budelman

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: once the wind picked up at the beach, the poles bent when trying to fold it up and head home. It will now not fold back up and will not maintain its original shape. I would not recommend this tent for anyplace with moderate winds, like most beaches. Pay the extra money for something more robust. Horrible! I bought this to keep the kids under the tent while I tan at the beach. This tent does not stay up! We have weights on all four corners and it’s still falling over. So sad I wasted all this money.we ended up just thrown in the garbage.It was awful and I DO NOT RECOMMEND this product.Very cheaply made. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Not for windy areas! Poles won't hold up!
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is nice and pops up in a sec but when we took it to the beach yesterday (pacific beach, kind of windy) it had noooo chance. The wind kind of folded it kompletly. No chance to sit in there with our baby as the sidings flattered in our faces. Actually the wind bend the poles so bad that i was not able to fold it afterwards anymore(i folded it before, so I'm sure I can do it and have practice with two other pop up tents). Now I'll put it in the trash. So after I used it two times it's not working anymore. totally wasted money!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: Just terrible.. wouldn’t stay open.. difficult to fold.. just ruined my beach day..watched a video online and still can't get it to fold back up ! it was impossible to fold! Frame bent with no pressure ,and now the entire tent is unusable which is super disappointing being it is an $70 tent.. Worst amazon purchase! I would rate less if I could ! Junk.....Complete waste of money and time!! so irritating !!
customer_reviews.author: Bbao

customer_reviews.title: It's super light and easy to setup/take-down
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but totally worth it. It's super light and easy to setup/take-down. We traveled to Hawaii with a <1yr old and grandma and sent this as one of our checked bags. Grandma & baby stayed cool and covered in the tent during the hot afternoon hours. I would recommend this for anyone traveling with small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this more stars, because it is a great tent. The downside is folding the darn thing! I had been using this for my girls at swim meets. Each Tim the tent became harder to fold. By the last meet I had to have several other parents try and help me. I was about to throw it in the trash. I still might because the wires are bent to **** from trying to get it back in the bag. Unfortunately, this is a one season tent. Not worth buying every season for this mom...
customer_reviews.author: louwhoski

customer_reviews.title: fun and easy to go to the beach now
customer_reviews.text: love the tent. just throw it and it's set up! easy to go to the beach now not having to bring blankets and multiple umbrellas. I still bring one umbrella to shade the front but still watch the ocean. I love that it let's breeze thru to keep cool which my previous tent didn't have and was too hot. it's easy to fold and easy to clean sand off back at home because of how it just snaps up. hope it holds up but seems well designed. used it 4 times now and purchased another as a friend wanted one too!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Music

customer_reviews.title: great for beach days and picnics!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Miami, FL and this is a game-changer for beach days. This keeps us in the shade and is easy to pop-up and secure (by filling up the sand pouches or sticking the small pins in the ground). Folding it back up took some practice but we managed to get it after a few tries. Purchased this and a smaller tent as well but ended up keeping this one; the added pouches on the interior and zip up/down windows are great touches as well.
customer_reviews.author: _lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works Well! Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sun coverage! Put it up in seconds, with a bit of practice fold it up in seconds! Comfortably fits 2 adults and 3 kids...
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: So easy for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, once you get the hang of folding it back into the pouch, you're going to LOVE this. It can hold myself, my husband, and our three year old easily. The instructions are conveniently attached to the bag so just in case you forget between uses, they got your back. Super easy to transport, and set up. Has sandbags you fill so it doesn't go flying off. Has zipper windows for when you want to snooze or hide totally from the sun. Also very lightweight. Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: L. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Sets up instantly, lightweight and roomy enough for me and my three!!!! ☀️ 🏖
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for giving me the ability to go to the beach again with my kids. I cannot handle the beating sun for long, so we got this instant up ‘cabana’ tent. Super easy to setup- literally open and give it a second and poof!!! It’s up and ready. Add sand to pockets to anchor (awesome feature) , one person up & one person down. Roomy enough to get us out of the sun or out of the wind to eat without the blowing sand! Closes flat with little effort. Lightweight, even fir me with a carrying limit of 5 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Treefrogs are my spirit animal.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME - better than all others I've seen. Fit two of us (snuggly) to get out of the sun - the windows on the sides are really cool. Also includes a pocket (hard to see but right under each window) to store stuff (phone, sunscreen, etc.). Takes a little to figure out how to collapse it but after 3rd try, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: DSterling

customer_reviews.title: Beach tent
customer_reviews.text: The pop up tent was so easy to assemble. Took it out for a test run in my backyard and the tent was huge which could fit 3-4 people. Quality and material is good there is nothing to complain about. When putting it back in the bag it is a little tricky at first but once you get the hang of it then it should be easy. Also the have an instruction tag on the tent itself showing you steps on how to dessemble the tent just incase some one needs help.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Review from a June 2020: I am so impressed with this companies customer service. After my review below they immediately sent me a new tent and followed up to see if I was satisfied. Lovely and polite. Customer for life. Review from May 2020: This tent was awesome but I just opened it and now it’s all lopsided. I kept it safe flat behind a couch all winter. I tried to contact Wolfwise to ask if there was a way to just adjust it but no success.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Tested indoors. It’s staying as a play tent!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know where to start! So we got this for the beach in a couple of days however my husband decided to test it out in our living room the day we got it. It’s staying! My baby loves it so so much. Test successful I would say! It’s light weight but doesn’t scurry off. It has also withstood my dogs nails so 100 on durability! It’s a great size! The 3 of us are easily able to be in the tent comfortably! Can’t wait to take it to the beach
customer_reviews.author: blackrose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Several people asked about it the first time we used it at the park. I am curious to know if this actually is a sun protecting shade because sun did get through the fabric. It was fairly hot on the inside — not a strong breeze that day, but we were also in direct overhead sun. Large enough for two plus some gear and small dog. I was able to fold it on the first try using the attached picture instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It’s big, which is a pro and a con!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this thing is huge — fits hubby, me and our toddler with space for more stuff. I love that it has windows on the sides you can open and shut to control airflow so it’s not just a sauna inside like with other tents. That being said, it’s also not the smallest thing when folded down. It does fold flat and has a nice carrying bag, but it’s still quite large in this form so plan accordingly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina H

customer_reviews.title: Last beach shade you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup and takes seconds to enjoy a shaded area anywhere you need it. Storage takes practice and a few repetitions to get right. Recommend practicing in your back yard before taking out. Tent is very stable on a windy day if “pockets” attached to edges of tent are filled with sand or are weighed down. While others are struggling to assemble tent poles and stake the tent down on a windy day, your shade will already be up and ready for you to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Manny B.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive size and Setup
customer_reviews.text: This pops right up with the spring steel frame, producing a nice covered area for our family. It's a little tricky to fold back up, but kudos to WolfWise for sewing in the folding instructions directly on the tent. Once you master that skill it's a piece of cake to put away quickly. We'll be making use of this in the mountains as well as beaches whenever we can.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hall

customer_reviews.title: a hole on the tent
customer_reviews.text: bought this tent two weeks ago, and took it out. and unfolded it. and immediately found a hole on the bottom corner. kinda disappointed , ruined our beach party plan. hope it is just the one i received
customer_reviews.author: jz11

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and Easy Set up
customer_reviews.text: The beach tent is ideal for these hot sunny summer days. I have used it in the parks and at the beach. It is has been big enough for me and my friend to escape the sun's beating rays while letting an ocean breeze in. Super easy to set up, but a little tougher to fold up (needed to look up the video to fold it up, not the most intuitive thing to do). But overall I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amish

customer_reviews.title: This is the best beach tent on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our son who was taking our grandson to the beach with friends. It was extremely easy to set up and fold away. While the other dads were struggling with setting up their tents, this one was up in seconds. There’s nothing to improve with the design. It’s perfect for keeping your little one out of the sun and roomy enough for adults. There are several windows to keep the baby cool
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Your own little condo on the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent for the beach! I love it! It is nice & roomy, fits me, my 6 ft husband and our stuff comfortably with room to spare. The windows on either side is nice, the zip down back “door” is great as well. It’s truly like your own little condo. The material is pretty thin, but is good enough for beach use. The fold up process is very simple & it packs down to about 3 inches thick. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lesia Howell

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to go to the beach with this but taking it easy due to COVID-19. I still used it in my backyard in the sun and turned out to be pretty good. First of all it is very light weight and can be carried anywhere easily with the carry bag. Folding it a bit challenging in the beginning but it had instructions and got used to it. It can fit two average adults and a kid easily. I can’t wait to go to the beach with this.
customer_reviews.author: Gurubrahma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: The sunshade was a lot bigger than what I anticipated, mainly because it is so light and compact inside the bag. It folds out instantly without any problem. It fight my two young kids and myself comfortably with plenty of room. Used it at the beach for a week and had many people stop and ask where I purchased it. The only thing I had to give a couple tries to was folding it back up, but that only took me a minute or two. For perfectly back in the bag. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pao333

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, just not in windy weather
customer_reviews.text: Overall mostly what we wanted, with two notable caveats: 1) Not very usable in windy conditions (which seems to be the case at our beach most of the time) 1) Folding the thing takes a bunch of practice & patience (and is nearly impossible if windy!) Should be pretty great for backyard, park, or picnic use. A windy beach? Not so much :(
customer_reviews.author: Petrik

customer_reviews.title: Handy, easy, big enough
customer_reviews.text: We loved having this easy, durable, lightweight pop-up shade tent at the beach! I was a little concerned it wouldn't be big enough, but it's perfect for the kids, and the grownups fit too. It was definitely too crowded when we tried to fit 2 kids, 2 adults, and a dog though! It pops open instantly, comes in a carrying case with a shoulder strap, and has instructions for folding up sewn into the case. Once I figured it out, it was very easy. So happy to have this handy addition to our beach trips!
customer_reviews.author: LilSisAZ

customer_reviews.title: Most convenient tent!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of a few purchases our family made for our annual beach trip and I am so glad we did! It’s also perfect for staying out of the sun in the backyard. Super lightweight. It unfolds in seconds and folds back up pretty easily. I haven’t tried it against much wind yet but it has stakes and also bags on the end for sand to weigh it down.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: We didn’t get a chance to use it
customer_reviews.text: After we got it, we decide to see how big it was, the ease to set up take down etc. Well, I like the size, it was a pop up set up BUT it leaned to the side and it took a couple of YouTube videos to see how to fold it back up. So we returned it and got something more stable, same size but this tent was easy to carry with its own bag and quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach or park!
customer_reviews.text: I’m highly impressed with this pop up tent. It’s the perfect size to use as shelter from the sun for multiple kids and/or adults at the same time. The center area is really tall. Our three year old can comfortably stand up all the way in the middle. When adults sit you still have about 6-10 inches above your head and this is a huge selling point for me as other tents are to low to sit in comfortably for long periods. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: matt diering

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product but issue was satifactorily resolved
customer_reviews.text: Product looked amazing but had 2 slices in the material when first opened. I contacted WolfWise about the damaged product. They offered improper resolution. Final offer was $15 and keep the tent. The tent cost around $60 and is damaged, so that offer was certainly not satisfactory. We attempted to use the tent one more time in spite of the 2 slices in material and yet another cut showed up in the netted 'window' of the tent. This product is not worth the money. But, after this review, we were offered a full refund for the product, which we considered fair and proper resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Chard

customer_reviews.title: The beach tent is nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The beach tent is nice and comfortable. It's a good thing that the instruments on how to fold back the tent is attached to the bag. It's not that hard to fold back the tent after 2 try. Just make sure you are holding all parts correctly. Opening the tent is very easy. The zipper on the back of the tent is nice too. You can unzip it if you want air to blow through. Or if the kids are playing hide and seek. The hold thing is not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Steph83

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could get a refund on this. Even the pictures presented on other reviews showed an amazingly good size for a beach. It’s not. Not even for a backyard picnic. I opened and found a tear. Then later when setting up, the zipper was stuck. It would not stay up. Terrible. I saved up money JUST for this. Only to be let down.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, good idea
customer_reviews.text: Practice first at home because it isn't the simplest to operate. If you are efficient at setting it up and taking it down you'll be fine. Would be 5 stars but the sand bags began to rip off on the first use. It's sturdy once it's in place but not so amazing getting to that point because of lack of reinforced stitching anywhere. I added that myself and really like the results. Always gets peoples attention and makes our weekly beach trips way better. Self contained atmosphere so no matter how busy the beach is you get privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and compact
customer_reviews.text: I love how light weight and easy to transport this tent is. My family went to Myrtle beach and stayed in a hotel. I had a new baby and needed a way to keep him out of the sun and also a place for the older kids to rest. My only complaint is it takes. But if practice to fold up and put away. It gets easier though the more you fold it up.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my 7 month old from the sun at the beach. This was a great purchase for our little family. One benefit that isn’t likely discussed much is that it allowed my wife to lay down and breastfeed in privacy. It’s lightweight, setup took just a few minutes, and I was able to help while even holding my son. Getting it back in the bag was a bit of a challenge but after the second time using it, it was much easier and was certainly worth a slight inconvenience. I read lots of reviews on these tents before pulling the trigger on this one and so far I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Kellerbauer

customer_reviews.title: Keep me out of the sun
customer_reviews.text: Every year at our annual family beach week, the kids and grand kids love to play on the beach. I love being there with them and available if I'm needed, but I really hate the sun. Been sunburned way to many times. So this tent was the solution. Easy up, plenty of room. Easy down. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: As hoped 4
customer_reviews.text: when the box came it was way smaller than expected. I thiugh what a rip off its not much bigger than 9 dollar Walmart. I was happily impressed when I threw it and it popped into an impressive as advertised. Product. Plenty big. Better than expected. Wish i could zip close front not just back.
customer_reviews.author: tech guy dm

customer_reviews.title: Very small for even one person.  UPDATE about customer service and quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is very misleading. Maybe two people laying on towels will fit in it. One person on a low beach chair will be hit in the head with very little breeze. Above was my original review with one star. I was contacted by the company and offered a refund or replacement. Customer service for WofWise is very impressive. I was sent another style which is much sturdier yet still small. I would recommend this product for two adults laying on towels. the product is very good for this and again WolfWise stands behind their product for quality. I greatly appreciate the level to satisfy me. Customer Service is 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Alva L. Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach trips!
customer_reviews.text: Being extremely fair-skinned, sometimes sun screen just isn't enough, but this tent provides great shade! I love how light and portable this is! Set up took less than a minute, and it was very easy to fold back up (I used to have a window shade for my car that folded up the same way)
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Hell to put away
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, although the picks for in the sand aren’t long enough and pull right out if it’s a windy day, we had to use our bags inside for weight. It is absolutely HELL ON EARTH to get back into the bag and takes so long to fuss with. Buying a different one for our next trip and tossing this one...no way.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Crazy easy
customer_reviews.text: So easy. Literally open bag, pop up. Has bags on the sides so you can fill it with sand for stability. There are also steaks & ties to do that as well. Super easy to close up. Great size and shaded the kids nicely. Several people at the beach asked about it. Everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material.
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy but I question the durability as it is very thing. Luckily, I only paid $26 from Amazon Warehouse deals (box was banged up and didn't see anything wrong with the tent, yet.) Unlike the product picture, it was also very wrinkly so I hope that gets smoothed out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use + Easily Fits 3-4 people
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge and very easy to operate. It's thin and flimsy so I don't recommend it for windy days. However, we've been using it to easily go to parks with our baby during covid, give him a sheltered play area and keep us socially distant. It's been wonderful for that.
customer_reviews.author: Sena Zorlu

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to pop open
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this pop up tent! Super easy to pop open, easy to close after one practice run. Once you've closed it a few times it's super quick and fits right back in the bag no problem. It was a great place for my 3month and husband to nap and stay out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Richey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good beach tent. I’m 6’3” so I can’t prop up a camping chair inside, nor can I stretch out completely when the sun is at a particular angle. Nevertheless, this provides the shade and private beach cocoon needed. I have had to weigh it down with a backpack, camping chair, and loaded water cooler on windy days, as the included tent stakes aren’t quite long enough to anchor it into the sand. This still does everything I needed it to do and meets my expectations for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: LeftOfTexas

customer_reviews.title: This tent is huge!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is huge! We’re a family of 3 plus one on the way and this tent can fit all of us comfortably 2 adults and 1 toddler. Mind you we are short ppl, all under 5’7 lol. But I’m 5’1 and can lay down comfortably and my feet doesn’t even pass the top of the tent. When it folds, it is bigger than I expected though. But it’s very easy to set up and take down as long as you follow the instructions that’s attached to the bag. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miandra

customer_reviews.title: Best beach purchase with kids
customer_reviews.text: We have two kids 4yr & old 8month. I am so happy with this purchase bc it has been a lifesaver for our trip to the beach with two little ones. I wanted something that both kids could fit in or an adult and a child for naps/feedings during long days at the ocean. It has been great! Quick to set up and easy to shake off and fold up. I would buy it again with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup/takedown and fun
customer_reviews.text: We used a friend's and recently got our own. We love this design - easy to shake of sand/dirt, super quick to set up and a breeze to take down. It is very light, so you need weight inside to hold it down (or you can sandbag it or strap it). Great protection from the sun but with a nice open front so you don't sacrifice the view. Only word of warning is for dog paws... ours put a small slit in it with his nail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought new but came used.
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it was a true pop up and use tent. Only thing I didn’t like was it was obviously used and returned. The attached sand bag pouches already had sand in them and there were some scratches on the top of the tent where you Could tell it was used. I ordered a new item. Not used item. So it’s annoying. Otherwise, it’s an awesome product. But I want a new one or a discount for a used item.
customer_reviews.author: Patty TK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the beach. We live in Florida and boy is the sun brutal. Perfect for me who is pale skinned, and my pup loved it. She was using the little air vent to watch her daddy in the water with our golden retriever. Nice breeze goes through the the vents even in the summer humidity in Florida. Took a couple try’s to fold it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tilly

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new granddaughter who is 2 months old. She lives by the beach in Mexico so it is always sunny and hot. We were on vacation with her and this tent was perfect by the pool and beach. Big enough to sit inside with her and feed her and she could stretch out. And having sun protection is a must!!! Lightweight and easy to carry with all the beach gear.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L

customer_reviews.title: I'll never own another beach umbrella again.
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida and spending a lot of time at the beach I've always fought with a cumbersome umbrella. I tried this on a lark. No more umbrellas for me. This thing is super easy to transport, takes up no space, pops up and tears down quickly. I'm through with umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Instant Tent in Seconds.
customer_reviews.text: Open and close in blink of the eyes. Take this out to the beach or lake and enjoy. This Tent big enough for 3 people sit in comfortable. My wife and I love this tent. Also this tent can open the back and the sides to get full air flow. Materials are great, use twice and have no issue with it. Love how easy to open and close this tent. Considering buy another as a gift for my brother, trust me the tent worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Luan Nghiem

customer_reviews.title: Love minus closing it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I would have given it 5stars if I didn't have difficulties closing it. It took my 7/8 mins to close and that was with 5 ppl. Otherwise, it fit 3 of us inside , kept us comfortable at the beach, easy to carry and put others stuff in the bag son I didn't have to transport multiple bags and it protected us from the sun. I rather this then a beach towel or chair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Used it a bunch when my kids were babies at the beach and even the dogs love to use it in the yard lol. It’s huge inside. There’s a technique on how to fold it up, highly recommend searching for videos on YouTube of how to do it before trying
customer_reviews.author: Jcc

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but hard to take down
customer_reviews.text: Great for the beach. It’s very roomy and super portable. But be warned— folding this baby back-up and into the carrying case can be a challenge!
customer_reviews.author: @abadassforce

customer_reviews.title: My children don't want to come out of this product.
customer_reviews.text: If I don't have this product now, I don't think I can enjoy the summer perfectly. I use it at home as well as outdoors. My children don't want to come out of this product. This product is too light and convenient. Contrary to what I expected, the size is also large. It's a well-made product. It may take some time to fold the first few times again. However, the folding method is attached to the tent case with the photographic description. It's easy and simple. Be sure to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! I bought it so I can use at the beach and parks. There’s enough shade provided by the tent. Used it at the beach the day after I got it. It was easy to use and it was light weight. I love how there’s a pouch for it also.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with Great Ventilaton
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pop up tent for my daughter to use at the beach with my 3 month old granddaughter. The tent was very roomy, it was possible to have 3 people in at a time. Windows could be opened for ventilation & closed for privacy. There was also extra ventilation around the whole bottom of the tent. Opening the tent is very easy. Folding can be a little tricky but becomes easy with practice. Also comes with a nice carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: mdbeachbum

customer_reviews.title: Convenient fast and easy baby /adult sun tent.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the beach! Babies can hang out in the shade and play also take a nap. Super easy to pop up , it did take a bunch of try’s to learn how to fold back down but once you ge the hang of it its easy! Love that it folds down to a size where you can put into the bag it comes with and carry it on your shoulder. Super lightweight. Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Manuela C

customer_reviews.title: Unfoldable and Horrible Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is impossible to fold and super flimsy! The instructions are worthless and not clear. In addition, the frame arrived bent so the sides did not match up in order to fold up. I promptly packaged it up as best I could (after 2 hours) and sent it back to the Hell from whence it came!
customer_reviews.author: Jokero

customer_reviews.title: Zipper breaks and gets harder to fold with each use
customer_reviews.text: Stopped folding after 2 uses. Then zipper broke on packing bag and it was over. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: awesomepossum87

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies/kids  at the beach
customer_reviews.text: This tent was perfect for my infant grandson at the beach. Unfortunately, when we unpacked it, we discovered it was damaged (almost like a burn in the carrier through to the bottom of the tent). We still used it as it was and requested a replacement from Amazon which they promptly sent to us! It was great for a napping spot for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just opened and I love it. Popped up into a large tint! I’m very happy. Though the fabric seems cheap and easy to rip, it’s very lightweight making it easy to carry. The sand bags are awkward but I’m hoping it’ll hold the tint on windy beach days. It would be awesome for parks. I will update if it stands the wind and Florida sun. Shockingly easy to fold after trying a few times I’m very satisfied with my purchase. I’m 5’5 and easily laid across the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A Great Beach Item!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is worth the money. We purchased it for our nephew, who’s a toddler and loves to go to the beach. The tent is easy to setup and has a sturdy build. It’s also a great way to keep any snacks safely away from seagulls. If you’re into practical and easy-to-use items, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: ScholarGamerNerd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beach day
customer_reviews.text: This held up well. It had plenty of room to keep our beach bag and two beach chairs. We loved that we didn't have to deal with poles to set up. Be careful when filling the sides with sand. One of the pockets ripped a little at the seams when we were packing up, but I contribute that to user error. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight! Took it to the beach last weekend to test it out and I'm impressed! So lightweight and easy to pop open and close! The carrying case is awesome to put on shoulder so you can have to a free hand. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Infamos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach tent (especially for kids)
customer_reviews.text: I can't overemphasize how perfect this tent was. It provided incredible shade, but never felt hot or stuffy due to the airflow. The mat is large enough to allow multiple people to sit inside. We used it to keep a baby out of the sun at the beach and it was noticeably cooler inside it. The material is lightweight, but strong. If you use the lines, it stayed perfectly upright during extremely heavy winds on the beach. A+
customer_reviews.author: morley

customer_reviews.title: Great little beach pop up
customer_reviews.text: Set up is impossible to screw up. Folding was not easy but I did figure it out( watch video) Perfect for getting out of the sun and the standard air mattress fits fine. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great , love it  vupfate, just ok
customer_reviews.text: Great , could be a better price for what it is but it is light weight and easy to use , Ii would recommend it for beach shade . Update , used it at beach , pretty flimsy , least bit of wind would flatten it .
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not a four person tent
customer_reviews.text: I never have left a review good or bad about a product, but I felt strongly that this beach tent was misrepresented by the manufacturer. The description of this product stated that it was a four man tent. We could only fit two adults comfortably. Maybe you can fit 4 kids/teens. The directions to fold the tent back up and into the carrying case were not clear. We had to shove it in the trunk of the car to come home and try to figure it out the next day by watching the vidoe. It would be nice to have clearer step by step instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lee Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good tent but hard to fold.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent and it comes with a carrying bag but folding it back is a nightmare to such degree that I bought a different beach tent form Costco in order to not to have to fold it again.
customer_reviews.author: Artur C.

customer_reviews.title: Renting a beach shade instead of packing this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take on a flight... Thinking it would be a nice compact shade to sick in our checked luggage. Lol. It's huge. Should have read the dimensions of the closed bag! We're letting it for local beach trips and just renting one for this trip.
customer_reviews.author: hbhighfi

customer_reviews.title: May as well call it a disposable tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is only good when you first open it. Once it’s folded back, it’s never the same. It starts drooping and doesn’t lay flat. After the second time, it was completely useless. What a waste of money and time. Huge dissapontment and would never recommend. Update: the customer service with WolfWise is impeccable! They immediately recognized the issue and reached out to me to remedy the situation in a timely fashion. I am certainly planning to come back to this vendor to purchase their products in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Money is hard no a day with all that’s going on they make it look easy and it took 5 people to help
customer_reviews.text: This item came without nothing to hold down so it flew away then we had five people to help us close. Its a complicated item plus u can’t return and now we stucj with missing piceses to hold down product on a product we thought would sit and not fly away then not able to close and being embarrassed. Plus we can’t return so lost if money and no use for us
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. It literally pops up in seconds. It held up in the wind and it has plenty of ventilation. I did have to follow the instructions to take it down but it is easy and one person can easily do it. I bought this to replace another tent that broke when the pop-up mechanism wouldn't release and one of the poles snapped. Don't have to worry about that with this one and it truly was easy to take down. It's also light so easy to carry. It easily fits two beach chairs and it's deep, so there is room for bags, etc. behind the chairs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent for the first time at the beach last weekend. It popped right open with no assembly, as advertised. Provided great shade and the inside pockets were great to hold my book and snacks. I weighed it down with 1lb soft wrist weights that I had at home and unzipped the windows to get a nice breeze. The instructions to fold it and place it back in the zippered carrying bag are right on the tag, so they won’t get lost, and easy enough to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Love it but hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: Love it once it’s up but what a pain in the butt to fold up. The directions are vague and it took me almost 10 min to kinda figure it out. Still not sure if I’m doing it right . Wish you have a video to wT h or something . But it’s the perfect size once it’s up .
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: A must for a family beach trip!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gem to have on an ALL day beach trip for my family. The deluxe size easily fits both my kids (ages 3 and 9). It is hard to fold up but that was due mainly to wind on the beach. Otherwise, I think it's pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jess S.

customer_reviews.title: Biggest problem is the fold up. It's not a problem if they showed you better how to do it.
customer_reviews.text: Used for the beach. Very easy pop-up and light. Good quality. Only problem is they did not, even in their own video, emphasize the importance, when vertical, to tuck one ring towards the middle,then everything will be easy. It took me hours to figure that out (my son showed me), even though the first time I did it, by accident. With the reviews that said it was hard to fold, it's amazing to me they couldn't do a better job of explaining the fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great beach tent. I bought this because I have 2 small kids. This is simple to set up and easy to use. No struggling and we get shade. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: Easy open. Great use. Folding it back takes practice and a good YouTube video
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this sooner. Great shade for park. Prob won’t take this to beach though. Seems like sand would get info all the crevices and not come out.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Arbogast

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take down!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and big enough to comfortably fit 2-3 adults and some supplies. Ropes and stakes helped keep the tent secure during a windy beach day. Easy to set up but be careful how you fold it back up or it may not be as neat and uniform in shape as it originally came. It’s very easy and light. Perfect for the beach or indoor camping.
customer_reviews.author: liz cong

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to assemble and disassemble. The UV protection. Is great. It’s compact, yet roomy. The windows are great to let some breeze in and also to keep it out when you zip it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gamez

customer_reviews.title: We have become a walking advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This tent has made the beach experience so much more pleasurable especially with kids involved , it really is so easy to get around with it. I have had so many people approach me at the beach asking where this can be found and how fun it is to watch me open it up. Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Belles

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent.
customer_reviews.text: i used it in my backyard and it really protects from sun. It is really easy to ooen and pack again. I jope it had something that coukd cover the front.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: The best beach tent is one that allows you to savor ...
customer_reviews.text: The best beach tent is one that allows you to savor the great outdoors while providing sufficient protection from the sun. The best beach tents may be considered as an investment, but most of the good ones are quite affordable and come with plenty of features. this tent is tents are family sized so two adults and a couple of children can fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy! My boyfriend and I took this to the beach knowing we would be there all day long, and the tent would allow us to get a break from the sun. It’s big enough for both of us to lie down in, along with our cooler and beach bags. It’s tricky to fold back up again, but the how to videos are helpful! The more you do it the easier it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not for more than one person!
customer_reviews.text: It pops up easily. It’s lightweight. It does not fit 3-4 people. It worked okay for my husband to get some shade on beach but not worth $80.
customer_reviews.author: Meri D

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for the trip, at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Best, best , best😂😂😂. So happy we bought this. Excellent in any way, pops open with one hand, folds fast, carries flat really well in the car, we're s o cool now on the beach. Highly recommended for a family with infants, etc..
customer_reviews.author: sambazon

customer_reviews.title: Positives outweigh negetives
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return it at first because it was much bigger then I expected but after using it we love it. Easy to open, it just pops out. It takes a few practice runs to fold it up and put back in the bag but once you get it its reasonably easy unlike other tents we tried which ended up in the garbage. Sand bags are key and there are 4 of them and ventilation is good. Bag is a little large for my taste but extremely light. In short the positives outweigh the negetives......Go ahead, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent but Hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful product that we took to the beach and it was perfect. It was nice and roomy and did a great job protecting us from the sun. The only thing was it was quite challenging to fold up even with the directions that were included. In th end, I just kept it up the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great little tent
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Easy fold down once you know to twist and fold at the same time. My toddler took a nap in it while we were at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Karen N.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I love that it opens on both ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I love that it opens on both sides and that I was able to fold it easily. I just wish it was smaller when folded so I could put it in my diaper or beach bag. It is very big when folded
customer_reviews.author: M. C. P. Yepiz

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get back in the bag
customer_reviews.text: Here is what I did like--it went up easily and was lightweight and easy to carry. On a not so windy day, it wouldn't stand up to the wind at the beach. Then, it was difficult to get in the bag--the first time I used it and the second time I used it, the zipper broke--I put it in the dumpster on my way to the car. Got two uses out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WolfWise UPF 50+ Easy Pop Up 3-4 Person Beach Tent Sport Umbrella Instant Sun Shelter Tent Sun Shade Baby Canopy
feature_bullets: Pop Up Design & Portability: Pops up and folds down in seconds, no assembly required. Ultra-lightweight construction allows for easy transportation with included carrying bag. Weighing just 4.2 pounds and folds down to a travel size of 29.5" L x 29.5"W x 1.6" H.

Spacious Space & 360-degree Ventilation: The tent is 86" L x 57" W x 47" H providing a spacious interior shelter that comfortably fits 3-4 people ( 3 adults, or 2 adults with 2 kids). High density mesh windows with large entrance and full-size rear door to deliver 360-degree ventilation for better dissipation of body heat and odor. It provides an ideal shade for your little boys when it has a moment of rest in the middle of the soccer game or baseball game.

UPF 50+ & Water Repellent: The water repellent polyester with taped seams keeps the inner shelter dry, and the silver coated tent surface reflects and absorbs sunlight to block up to 98% of the suns harmful ultraviolet rays which protect user from ultraviolet rays.

Durable Construction: The tent is made of anti-tear 190T polyester for long lasting performance. The frame is made of galvanized steel which is not easy to break and protects against corrosion. Compared with other brands, they use fiberglass for their frames which makes it unstable and easy to break.

Creative Design & More Stability: The rear double pull sliders of the tent makes for more convenient entry and exit. Two storage pockets below each window to keep small items organized. 4 corner sand pockets are designed to be filled with sand for added stability on beach.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars727 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
